message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this exceptional product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $20,000.
Alice, that's a bit high for me. I'm interested in the product, but I can't go over $15,000.  Let me know if you're willing to negotiate.
I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $18,000. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really appreciate the value it brings.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $18,000 is still a bit high for me.  How about we split the difference and settle on $16,500?  That's a fair price for both of us.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I can offer it to you for $17,000. It's a good compromise, and I think you'll find it's worth every penny.
